notes: FEATURE: Implemented a full shared garage system with 4-digit door codes for security.
FEATURE: Added a server-side check to prevent duplicate garage names across all user profiles.
ENHANCEMENT: The event creation form now correctly populates with vehicles from both owned and unlocked shared garages.

FIX: Resolved a critical race condition by centralizing all DOM element selections into an `initElements` function, which now runs before all other initializers. This fixes multiple 'Cannot read properties of null' errors on page load.
FEATURE: Added quick-access icons for Garage Management and Winner's Circle to the global header for logged-in users.
FIX: Refactored `admin.js` to use event delegation, resolving a recurring TypeError on page load and ensuring all Developer Mode buttons are functional.
